title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Bus stop, day. The four boys stand at the bus stop waiting for the bus. Each of them wears a gas mask. The boys are silent.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: :	...Remember when life used to be simple and cool?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: ...Not really.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Uh, hey!  How's it goin', fellas?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: :	Butters, what the hell are you doing?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Huh, well, I'm just standin' around bein' a kid. Why? How come you're all wearing those spooky spaceman masks?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: These are gas masks, Butters!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yeah! If you don't have a gas mask, you're gonna get smallpox or anthrax!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: What?!  Oh, Jesus! I don't wanna get the 'thrax, fellas! Uh, what do I do?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: There's nothing you can do except stop breathing.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Stop breathin'?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yeah, you can't get it if you don't breathe.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Well. Alright, then.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Well okay. Next?  Next?  Let's see: Hotties, Juicy, Whoppers...  Okay, next? A-ha! What the hell are you doin' with this?!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Those are my Hootie Owlie Round-Tip Scissors.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: These are a weapon!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Awww, come onnn! How am I gonna kill people with those?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: I'll think of a way. Now move along!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: God-damnit!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Alright, next!  Okay, clear.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: South Park Elenentary, morning. Along with the regular flag on the flagpole, a larger flag is draped over the front of the school, covering some second-story windows and the center of the school sign. Inside, the kids filter into class and drop off their gas masks along the wall. The door has been fitted with an industrial lock. Butters enters and locks the door

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh, Jesus, man! They're gonna get me! Oh Christ!  they might - couild get me.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Alright class, as some of you may have heard, the President has asked that American children all send one dollar to the children of Afghanistan.  So I have a list of addresses and we're goin' to all chip in.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: HA! I'm not giving a dollar to those towelheads!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Eric, the Afghan people need our help!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh, I'm sorry, but I though we were at war with these assholes!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: We're at war with terrorists, fatass, not with Afghanistan, and the only reason that you care is that you don't wanna give up the dollar!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: That dollar buys me a chocolate milk for lunch! What, do you want me to just get a regular milk for ten cents?  Now look, it isn't our fault that terrorists hate us. We're just kids. We're not the ones bombing them now, we're- we're jsut kids.  There's a lot of crazy stuff goin' on in the world, but, we're caught in the middle. It's not our fault.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: The Afghan kids are caught in the middle, too!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yes, but they're sand monkeys!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Alright, children, we are all sending a dollar to the kids in Afghanistan! That's it! End of discussion!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: God-damnit, I hate regular milk!!!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Afghanistan, day. Adults mill around as fighter planes fly by and bomb a few buildings. Two boys enter from the left and face the camera. They begin to talk in a strange language. Two other boys appear, and it's apparent these boys are the counterparts to the boys in South Park. The one who looks overdressed has a goat. After what sounds like introductions, they move off to play some basketball at a nearby makeshift ball court. The boy who was the first to speak gives the ball to his friend, the second to speak. The friend shoots the basket, but a bomb falls on the backboard, launching the ball away from the court and destroying the backboard and pole

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: :	Awww!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: the Kyle counterpart says something about seeing a film, then the four move off to their right. They pay for their tickets and head for the doors. A bomb falls on the theater and blows it up

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: the Stan and Kyle counterparts talk to each other a bit, then head for a two-story building. They stop at the front door and a fighter plane drops a bomb on the building. Only the door remains

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: The Marsh house, day. The garage has a large flag draping the door. Inside, on the living room couch. Sharon is lying there covered with blankets and watching TV. On the floor around the sofa are bowls, candles, food, and other items. Sharon hasn't been off that couch in a while.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Another high-alert status for terrorists activity this weekend.  The government said "bad things are likely to happen." Meanwhile, the world continues to back down from their support of the United States  saying that they were really only kidding to begin with.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey Mom, door bell's ringin'.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Can huh get th'ere 'or me?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey, Sharon? Maybe you should stop watchin' the news for a little bit? Shu- Sharon, you've been watching CNN for about ah... eight weeks now. Don't you wanna watch somethin' else?  Shu-shu-sharon?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey, look at what the postman brought me! It's a big brown package from Afghanistan!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Weh, that's nahice.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: We sent the Afghani kids some dollars - they must have sent us something cool in return!  Do you have some scissors to get this open?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Stanely, your mother's a little freaked out right now. Why don't you go play with your big brown package from Afghanistan outside?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: :	Well alright.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Big brown package from Afghanistan??!!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: The Marsh house, night. Paramedics, fire trucks, the SWAT team, and the FBI are all there. Two klieg lights shine on the package as two Hazmat men approach the package. A crowd of residents looks on. Stan, Cartman and Kenny watch from the front.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Dude, what's going on?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: We got a package from the kids we sent dollars to. They sent us something back.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Prelims show negative, sir.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Then we're gonna have to blow it!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yes sir!!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: AAHH! This is it, man! It's over!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Tweek, calm down. Have some coffee.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Open!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Mma-a-a-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh, it's just a goat.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oohhh.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Look, it's a goat.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Awww.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: A precious goat.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ba-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey there, little guy.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Stay away from it! Terrorists could have given that goat anthrax or smallpox before sending it over! Johnson!!  Check the goat for diseases!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yes sir!  The goat seems to be clean, sir!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: I told you: those Afghan kids just wanted to give us something back for giving them four dollars.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Heh, four dollars for a goat? We got ripped off.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Alrioght, men, this area is secure. Let's head out!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Well what are we supposed to do with it?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ba-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: :	Yu- you're gonna have to take it home with you, Kyle.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Dude, my mom won't even let me have a hamster.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Kenny?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: (No fuckin' way, dude!)

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: My parents will never let me keep a goat

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Well, I guess we're gonna have to kill it.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: No, we're not gointa kill it, Cartman! We'll just have to  take the return address and mail it back to the kids in Afghanistan. Come on, goat.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ba-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Downtown South Park, night. All building windows have flags draped behind them, and some of the walls have flags on them as well. The post office hs two flags on wall-mounted poles. The last postal worker closes up for the night as the boys approach

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Uh oh, they're closing!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Excuse me, we wanna overnight this goat to Afghanistan, please?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Excuse me?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: It's an Afghanistan goat, so it can't stay here, or else it'll choke on the sweet air of freedom.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yeah.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Afghanistan?  H-I'm sorry boys, but our planes aren't flying there.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: They're not.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ma-a-a-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: The only planes goin' to Afghanistan are the military planes over at the base. I'm sorry.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Well yeah! The military planes. Come on, goat, we'll put you on one of them.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Stan, I don't think we're supposed to be in the military base. They might shoot us.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: I don't care! We're going!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Don't forget to bring a towel.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Aaagh!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh no, not Towelie.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: When goin' someplace new, you should always bring a towel.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Okay, thanks, Towelie.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Do you wanna get high?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: No, we don't wanna get high!!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: You mean, you don't want Towelie around?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: That's right!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: So am I to understand that there's been a ...Towelie ban?...

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Awww!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Goddamnit, get the hell out of here, Towelie!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Alright, see ya.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: The military base, night. Jeeps roll in as a batallion is assembled in the parking lot. A large cargo plane receives the vehicles and other cargo

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Alright, troops, we depart for Afghanistan in five minutes! Let's move out!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Alright, come on. We just gotta get the goat on one of these planes.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Isn't this exciting, Tony?  We're finally gonna see some action.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yeah, and uh, I hear that as soon as we land we get a USO show.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: We do!  Stevie Nicks is goin' to perform.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hoh, Stevie Nicks. Huh, I love her!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Okay, it's clear. Come on!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey you!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: What the hell do you think you're doing here?!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: ...Ba-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: H-uh, I'm sorry, Miss Nicks, uh.  Hey guys, this is Stevie Nicks.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh wow!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: ...Ma-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Uh, can I get a picture

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Miss Nicks. Over here, Miss Nicks!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: ...Ma-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh... M- Miss Nicks, I... I don't wanna bother you, but... could you sing a quick Fleetwood Mac for us. Could ya?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh yeah. Please. Come on, come on. Please. Yeah.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: ...Ma-a-a-a-a. Ma-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh! No way! That was wild! That was great!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Wait till I tell my sister about this; she is gonna flip!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Well, uh, we've gotta get Miss Nicks on the plane to Afghanistan, guys.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh, can we just get a-

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ah, sorry. Mss Nicks isn't answering any more questions.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh, sure, we understand. Move along.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: ...She looks great

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: She looks great

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Cargo plane, later. The boys walk up to the plane with the goat and prepare to put in in the cargo hold. A side door is open, with a ramp leading up to the hold

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: 'K, let's put him on here.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ma-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Shhh. There we go. You're gonna be okay, goat. You'll be back in Afghanistan in about 20 hours.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Stan, if you're finished having your tearful goodbye with the goat, we'd like to go now, please?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Alright, tango clear.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Waaah!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Let's head out.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Aw, son of a bitch!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey, wait! There are children in here!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: (Oh, shit, we're locked in.)

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ma-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Dude, looks like we're going tooh... Afghanistan.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Going to Afghanistan? Locked in a small space for 20 hours? How could things get any worse?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Awww!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: (Ee-hew-hoo!)

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Uh ho, you guys.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Afghanistan, next day. A cargo plane has landed and the camera pans from the plane to the runway behind it. Another cargo plane lands and rolls to a stop. The large cargo door drops down and the soldiers file out marching

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Welcome to Afghanistan, troops! Get your gear ready and report to the barracks at o-nine hundred!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Sir yes sir!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh God, it was horrible!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Twenty hours!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: (God-damn, it stinks like shit!)

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ma-a-a-a-a!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: What the hell?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Cartman farted in there! We had to breath it in for 20 hours!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: It didn't smell that bad; you guys are overreacting.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: I don't smiell any- boh! Oh God!  Hohhgh! Blagh!  Bleeaagghh

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Uh, whatever!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: You sonofabitch, Cartman!  You don't fart when you're locked in a small space with other people!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh, I'm sorry! Next time I'll just ask my fart nicely if it wouldn't mind staying tucked away for a while!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Alright alright, let's just get the goat back to his home!  We have to find this address.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ma-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: A large city in Afghanistan, day. Could be Kabul. Plenty of large building and roads abound, but they all look rundown or beat down - this is a city in decay. The boys walk through the city

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: God, what a craphole, dude! This is like East Denver! Jesus Chru-heist!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Dude, no wonder terrorists come from places like this! If I grew up here, I'd be pissed off, too!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey look! There's a taxi!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Haa-aa-aa.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hello. We need to go...  here.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: What is this? The freakin' Flintstones?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: The home of the Afghan boys. The taxi pulls up and drops the South Park boys off, then goes away. The boys approach the door

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Is this the right house?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: I think so.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Shomot chizimi frushi?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: A-ah, hi. We're from America.  Uh, we sent you the dollar? Uh, the four dollars? Yu, you sent us this goat?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Goat?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ma-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Here. Wu-we don't want it.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh, you want something alse? All we had was the goat. Your country bombed everything else.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: No, dude, we're n- we're not ungrateful. It's just... none of us can keep the goat

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: It was choking on the sweet air of freedom in America, so we brought it back to your crappy country.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh uh, and here.  Take this American flag as... a gift.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yaaay.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey! What the hell are you doing?!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yeah, they told us in school that everyone but terrorists love America.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Huh!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: What did you call us?!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Your country is the evil empire! Your government wants to rule the world! But your values and your spirituality are in the guh-ter!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Then why did you send us the goat?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Because, in Afghanistan, we have pride. If you send us something, we must send something in return.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: It doesn't mean we don't still hate you. Now, get out of here!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey! Hey, open the door!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: I told you! Jawas have no heart.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Jawas?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: You know, sand people.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: How come they hate America so much? What the hell did we do?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ma-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Well, we tried, dude. If anyone else in this craphole hates Americans, we'd better just leave the goat and get back to the plane!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Alright.  Oh look, he's following us. It's so sad.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: God, I hate you so much, Stan!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: What?  Howdy.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Um...  Greetings from Canada.  Well boys, it's aboot time we get to our hoose in Canada, isn't it?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ey, what the hell are you talking about?! I'm not a god-damned Canadian, and neither are you!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Cartman, you stupid asshole!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: ...Osama bin Laden!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Good job, fatass!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Dude, don't call me a Canadian!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: A cave in Afghanistan, day. "Not where Osama bin Laden is." Guards stand outside keeping watch. Inside, six guards interrogate the boys

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: You've gotta listen to me! We're not spies!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Look, I think I can explain everything. You see, my friend Stan here is an oversensitive animal lover. He's got a boner for this goat, a-

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Amaar madmallah

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oooo, alamalamalamalaah.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh crap, it's him!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ma-a-a-a-a.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Amalama hamahamahama?  Una HAqa mala

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ogh! Dude, it's called deodorant, okay? It's not expensive.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Haqaama hamahalahamahaqa.  U bataqataqaa maladala. Ameriqa la tabakabaka haka haqadaqadaqa  Haqahaqa, daaqadaqa!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Aaaaand... cut!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Dude, these people are insane.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: The Marsh house, night. Sharon has resumed watching SNN on the sofa

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: ...as more and more case of terrorist-related AIDS continues to grow. And this just in: the Taliban has apparently taken American civilians as hostages. The Taliban has just released this videotape , in which it is clearly visible that they have indeed captured  Steivie Nicks. Miss Nicks appears to be in good spirits, though her whereabouts are unknown.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey, Sh- Sharon? Ha- have you seen Stan in the last couple... days?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yes. I just saw him.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh okay.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Afghanistan, day. The general and his troops are watching the same report

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: With Stevie Nicks in captivity, the other members of Fleetwood Mac have been hidden so the Taliban can't get to them as well.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: They... took Stevie Nicks?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Bastards! Heartless, gutless bastards!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Alright men! Grab your guns and your Bibles! We are going to get Miss Nicks back!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hooray!!!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: The Afghan boys' home, at that moment

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: :	The Taliban's video also shows what appears to be four American children in captivity, though they could just be French.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: We have to help them.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Do you say??

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: They are not espies. They came to give us our goat back.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Screw them! They are evil Americans!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: I know! But if we don't help the innocent ones, then we are no better than the Americans are.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Help the Americans? That doesn't make sense.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Dude, we are espeaking English right now. Does that make sense??

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: :	Alright, let's go.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ehhh lohhh nuts!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Osama's cave, day. Inside, at table, the Taliban guards are celebrating Osama's birthday. The guards and Osama wear party hats

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Aw, jihad, jihad.  Oh?  Oh, oh! Ameriqa haqa haqa! Dursha! Dapadapadapa!  Hulagugla hugagugahagahaa!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Outside Osama's cave, day. The American and Taliban forces engage each other in combat.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Inside Osama's cave. Osama is still giving orders

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Qubada durqaana Ameriqanab! Qubada durqaana-

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey, what are you guys doing here?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: -alabalabaa

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Shh. We've come to save you.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: But I thought you hate us.

text: We do.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Cartman, where are you going??

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: I'm gonna go take care of this prick!

text: Cartman, he's crazy!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: He's not crazy, he's an idiot. I know how to deal with these people.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: .A flippity flappity floop! Jihad jihad!

text: Mehah...  What's up, bin Laden?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Arrrrrrrrrrrubadubaduba! Durbadurba haq!

text: Uh oh, 5:30, time to pray.  Allah, Allah, m'heh

text: Taba haqa??  Allah allah allah, allah hakadurrpa durpa adurpa hagalah

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Uh oh! Mmm-mm!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Outside Osama's cave, day. The American and Taliban forces are still fighting. The seven kids and the goat emerge from the cave

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: We will have to be quick! The Americans are attacking!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Where do we go?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Get down!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh Allah, Qosaiqe bono!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Tol dayoos!  You... murdering Americaaans!!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey, shut up, kid. America didn't start this war.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: America DID eh-start this war! They eh-started it YEARS ago, when they put their military bases on Muslim holy lands!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: A forest near the cave, at that moment. Osama bin Laden slinks around looking for Cartman. He stops next to a small bush. As bin Laden looks around the bush skittles away, then stops. Bin Laden sees the bush has moved and growls at it, aims his rifle, and walks up to it - four steps. The bush moves again, then stops. Bin Laden catches up in three steps. The bush moves again, then bin Laden tales a step forward. The bush moves again, then bin Laden tales another step forward. The bush leaps and bin Laden holds it in mid-air as Cartman drops to the ground. We get a view of the gun on Cartman's face from Cartman's perspective

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ramadan!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey look! An infidel!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Wuut? Peitoqaba!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: So that's what this is all about?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ishta fatwa open sesame!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Mmmm! Tastes like chicken. The ass of a chicken!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Proila foqabam!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Woohoo!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Outside Osama's cave, day. The fighting continues. Amid the fighting, the general crosses the battlefield.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: We're coming, Miss Nicks! Hang on!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ma-a-a-a! Ma-a-a-a!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Outside Osama's cave, day. The South Park boys line up opposite the Afghan boys. Stan faces Akmarh, Kyle faces the boy in blue vest.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: All right, I've had just about enough of this! They told us in school, and on TV, that most people in Pakistan and Afghanistan like America.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: And you believe it? It is not just the Taliban that hates America. Over a third of the world hates America!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: But why? Why does a third of the world hate us?

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Because, you don't realize that a third of the world hates you!!!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: :	 ...That doesn't make sense. You guys are just buttholes!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: You're butt-holes!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: You're buttholes!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Outside Osama's cave, day. Osama and Cartman are now out in the open desert. Osama resumes slinking around

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Youhoo.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: it's Cartman seated on a camel, dressed in a purple chador. Bin laden takes one look and he goes nuts over what he sees. His eyes bug out as he goes horizontal

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Haduqaduqaduqa.  Huqadukadukadukaduuu.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh bella, bella falafel.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
role: Mi amore. Fatwa, fatwa. [Cartman holds up a sign with a screw
text: and a baseball on it, then puts it away. Bin Laden hops away, then returns with a table, two chairs, two glasses and some wine, and sets up a table for two. He sets the camel down on one chair and sits on the other one opposite the camel. He then serves up some glasses of wine]

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Outside Osama's cave, day. The boys have moved away from the cave entrance, and the fat Afghan boy has rejoined them. Beyond them the two forces continue fighting

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Do you really think your civilization is better than ours?! You people play games by killing animals, and oppress women!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: It's better than a civilization that spends its time watching millionaires walk down the red carpet at the Emmys!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: ...He's got us there, dude.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: I got her. I got Stevie Nicks.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Me-e-e-eh.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Nearby... Osama's grinning widely at the camel. Cartman walks up in a different costume - that of the fussy movie director.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: There you are! Where have you been? We have another anti-American video to create!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh, dapidiuta ako.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hur-ry, get into wardrobe!  Oh hur-ry up, will you hur-ry?!  Oh, you look marvelous, dahling.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Haqa hamahama.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Come on! The cameras are ready!  Alright, there we go. Let's roll cameras.  Oh, and here's your microphone.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Ogh. America adirqadirqa-  Uh ohhh.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: We've done it! The Taliban is destroyed!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hoorayyy!!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Wow! I guess Cartman really did take care of them.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Terrorists is the craziest peoples. Eheeee!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: I got him! I got him!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Well, it looks like the Taliban and bin Laden are finally out of power.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yeup, you don't need us anymore.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hey, wait a minute. You know, you guys should know one thing.  Most people in America are good people. We just try to live day by day, like you guys do. Maybe if you took some time to see all the great things about our country, you'd see... we're not so different after all.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Yeah.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: That's fine. But we still hate you.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Oh... Well, I guess, maybe, someday, we can learn to... hate you too.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Maybe. In time.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: I'm confused.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: USO concert. The stage is set amid the pup tents and soldiers clamor around in the audience. "VICTORY!" The general takes the stage

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Great job, troops! Once again we have killed our enemies!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hooray!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Hooray! Yeah, we sure did!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: The world is now safe, thanks to you. And so now, as promised, here is Fleetwood Mac with Stevie Nicks!

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: Whoa. Yeah.

text: Just like the wild winged bird sings a song-

text: Maaa

text: Baby

text: Come on, let's go gat to the plane.

text: Dude! I almost thought those Afghani kids talked you into not liking America.

title: OSAMA BIN LADEN HAS FARTY PANTS
text: No, dude. America may have some problems, but it's our home. Our team. And if you don't wanna root for your team, then you should get the hell out of the stadium.
